spells.name: Control Summoned Creature
spells.description: Direct a summoned monster as if you had summoned it.

spells.name: Curse of Disgust
spells.description: Target is sickened when viewing a trigger.

spells.name: Exquisite Accompaniment
spells.description: Instrument maintains bardic performance for you.

spells.name: Rain of Frogs
spells.description: Summon a swarm of poisonous frogs.

spells.name: Haunting Choir
spells.description: Spirits cause wracking pain to listeners.

spells.name: Mad Monkeys
spells.description: Summon a swarm of mischievous monkeys.

spells.name: Malicious Spite
spells.description: Target is compelled to plot against another.

spells.name: Overwhelming Grief
spells.description: Grieving target can take no actions and is denied its Dex bonus.

spells.name: Smug Narcissism
spells.description: Target is distracted by its sense of self.

spells.name: Terrible Remorse
spells.description: Creature is compelled to harm itself.

spells.name: Witness
spells.description: See through the target's eyes and ears.
